com.twitter.heron.common.basics

Interface ISelectHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeronClient, HeronServer, MetricsManagerClient, MetricsManagerServer, StreamManagerClient, TMasterClient

    public interface ISelectHandler
    Implementing this interface allows an object to be the callback of SelectServer
